trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around November 11th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my lunch break from work. There is a pretty good view of the Boston skyline from our building, and I like to look at it while I'm enjoying a cigarette. Today I was sitting down looking at the city, and at first everything seemed normal, and then I realized that I was seeing two very bright lights that were not normally part of the skyline. I assumed my eyes were playing tricks on me, and decided that it was beacons on top of large buildings, however, after staring for a few more minutes I realized these light were very slowly moving, from right to left, I could gauge their movement in relation to how close or far they appeared to be from the Prudential. My mind was trying to come up with rational explanations, and since I was observing them from a good distance I wasn't sure if they were blimps or helicopters, but then I saw a couple of planes fly by the same area, and their lights were dwarfed by the ones I had been watching. I'm not sure what I saw, but it was very unusual, and I'm reporting it in the hope that maybe someone else saw the lights too.
